stories.text:
Avante IO is seeking experienced Terraform/Azure engineers interested in helping our team build out cutting-edge insurance CAT modeling and analytics technologies. We are building out exciting technologies (using Agile methodologies) at scale on Azure using some of the following technologies:

Terraform/Azure/Windows/Docker/C#/PostgreSQL/JIRA/Github/CircleCI

Your responsibilities will include working with underwriters and business associates in planning & building new features, fixing existing bugs, and working on performance problems. We are looking for engineers excited about working on challenging problems and comfortable with ownership of complicated technical problems.

Please submit applications to johnny@avante.io with the subject line: Terraform/Azure Engineer and include your place of residency. Include a CV when reaching out, as well as any GitHub links/projects you’re particularly proud of.

Your application will not be reviewed if you reside outside North America.
stories.title: Remote (Must Reside in North America) – Position Type: Full-Time Contractor
